content.rendered:
Milma Milk Packaging

A refreshing new look for a popular product after two decades.

Milma one of the most familiar names in the market wanted a contemporary, catchier look to stand out in supermarket aisles. It went in for a complete brand makeover and the new-look MILMA sachets were loved by the public.
